24
¿Qué es una ontología?
• “An ontology is similar to a dictionary or glossary, 
but with greater detail and structure that enables 
computers to process its content. (IEEE Standard 
Upper Ontology Working Group)
• “An ontology consists of a set of concepts, axioms, 
and relationships that describe a domain of 
interest.” SUMO ontology
http://ontology.teknowledge.com/
speaker: SYSTEM
